faq.question: When and where is the next edition of Scambi Festival taking place?
faq.answer: Scambi Festival 2022 is taking place in the neighborhood of Pigna, Sanremo, Italy, from the 25th to the 28th of August 2022.

faq.question: I already know I cannot be in Sanremo from the 25th to the 28th of August 2022. Will I be able to follow the meetings online?
faq.answer: Unfortunately, not. Virtual meetings deny the very definition of what we are working on. Physicality is a key factor in the human exchange and mutual growth we are pursuing.

faq.question: Canâ€™t wait to be there! Are there any accommodation solutions?
faq.answer: It is too soon to know for sure, but we are working on offering low-cost accommodation solution to allow the participation of everyone, no matter if local or coming from Tatooine.

faq.question: How much does the ticket cost?
faq.answer: Nothing. Scambi aims to be accessible to everyone, literally: there are no age limits, no activities inaccessible to people with disabilities, and, of course, there is no fee.

faq.question: Are the festival events being translated in English, too?
faq.answer: Last year, they were not. We are working hard to ensure language will not be an issue next time.

faq.question: How can I keep updated about your activities?
faq.answer: There are many ways: you can subscribe to our newsletter, follow our social media pages or directly contact us.

faq.question: I have a question still waiting for an answer!
faq.answer: We are not as clever as Sheldon Cooper, but we promise to do our best to help you. Either write a comment below, write us an email, or send us a message on social media.
